import React from "react"; import { Component } from "react"; class Crop extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.cropcolor ={ 0:"green", 1:"yellow", } this.Cropstate =[ {value:0, label:"Harvest"}, {value:1, label:"Processed"} ] } render() { return(

{ event.preventDefault() const cropname=this.cropname.value const location= this.location.value const price=window.web3.utils.toWei(this.price.value.toString(), 'Ether') const kg=this.kg.value this.props.postCrop(event,cropname,kg,location ,price) }}>
{ this.cropname = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="enter the crop type name" required />
{ this.location = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="enter the crop location" required />
{this.kg= input}} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter the total kg" required />
{ this.price = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter the price" required />
) } } export default Crop;
